DOC.brief_summary: Background : - This study design people need standard , non-research invasive coronary angiogram find heart disease . Researchers want take compute tomography ( CT ) scan people heart procedure see less invasive test also diagnose coronary artery disease . Objectives : - To learn new way view CT picture able accurately diagnose coronary artery disease . Eligibility : - People age 55 old need coronary angiogram . Design : - Participants screen medical record . - Participants may give blood sample . - Participants may CT scan heart without contrast . The CT scan interfere medical care . - Participants blood pressure heart rhythm monitor , , CT scan . They may electrocardiogram . - Before scan , participant intravenous catheter put arm . It use inject contrast . - Participants may take beta blocker slow heart rate . - Participants may take nitroglycerin tongue . It enlarge heart blood vessel improve picture quality . It may cause flush sensation headache . - Participants lie back pad table . The table slide large , donut-shaped machine . An x-ray tube move around body , take picture . They ask hold breath 5 second time . - Participants call 30 day angiogram . They answer question health , hospital visit , medical treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective International Study Coronary Subtraction Using 320 Detector Row CT ( CorSub )
DOC.detailed_description: Coronary calcium impair accurate evaluation coronary artery coronary compute tomography angiography ( CCTA ) . A novel approach potentially overcome limitation coronary calcium subtraction , area calcification identify non-contrast scan remove contrast enhance image .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Age 55 year 2 . Subjects refer coronary angiography 3 . Able understand willing sign Informed Consent Form EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Known allergy iodinate contrast medium 2 . Estimated GFR le 50 ml/min 3 . Atrial fibrillation continuous cardiac arrhythmia 4 . Known suspected intolerance contraindication betablocker medication ( i.e . significant reactive airway disease , decompensated heart failure , Mobitz type 2 second degree 3rd degree atrioventricular heart block ) 5 . Inability adequately hold breath 5 second 6 . Pregnancy . Women child bear potential must demonstrate negative pregnancy test within 24 hour study MDCT .
